selfIntroduction.p1: I am an independent developer, familiar with Vue, React, and Nuxt. I can also develop backend services using Golang and NestJS. I have knowledge of Linux operation and maintenance as well as virtualization, and I am able to independently deploy full-stack projects.
selfIntroduction.p2: I have experience in graphic design (using Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator) and video editing (using Final Cut Pro X). I pay attention to the aesthetic appeal of the interface and the user experience. I like to bring my creative ideas to life through code and visual presentations.
selfIntroduction.p3: I am passionate about building products with a human touch, and I also attach great importance to the quality of engineering and the user experience. Here, I will share my projects, experiences, and inspirations, and I hope to explore the boundaries of technology and creation together with you.
